articles.title: Prospective Commanders owner invests in Joe Gibbs Racing - ESPN
articles.description: A company led by Josh Harris, who has reached an agreement to buy the Commanders -- and Arctos Partners, a sports private equity firm, have become minority investors in Joe Gibbs Racing.

articles.title: What to Know About Texas Gov. Greg Abbott's Newly-Signed Laws Restricting Trans, DEI, and Labor Rights
articles.description: Texas Gov. Greg Abbott signed numerous bills this week, including some that restrict labor rights, ban transgender women from competing in sports, and bar universities and colleges from having their own diversity offices and training.
